author: Quint Forgey
title: Trump cheers states 'safely coming back'
description: The president's social media post comes after the governors of Georgia, South Carolina and Tennessee said they would roll back coronavirus-related restrictions.
content: Meanwhile, a few clusters of states have entered into pacts to facilitate regional economic reopenings including a Northeastern alliance made up of Connecticut, Delaware, New Jersey, New York, Massachusetts, Pennsylvania and Rhode Island, as well as a West Co… [+865 chars]
